message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60% and you can take 40%. This way we both get a decent amount and can still have a chance to negotiate further.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I've adjusted my offer to give you a slightly larger share. I'll take 55% and you can take 45%. Let's meet in the middle and make a deal.
You're getting desperate, I'm making a strong offer
I'm willing to compromise further. I'll take 30% and you can take 70%. It's a significant concession, but I'm hoping we can finalize the deal.
